full_output.summary: A passionate and skilled Computer Science graduate with a solid foundation in software development, specializing in Web Development and Problem Solving. Proven experience in developing and optimizing web applications, enhancing workflow automation, and managing large-scale projects. Strong problem-solving abilities and a track record of delivering impactful solutions in fast-paced environments.

certifications.description: Completed a comprehensive MERN Stack certification, mastering MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Developed an E-Commerce Website showcasing real-world functionalities.

social_work: Project Lead at Skillship Vellore Chapter: Conducted online training, collaborated on projects, and helped juniors develop new projects. Vellore, India Jan 2022 - Jan 2023

projects.name: SocialNet
projects.description: A social media application built using the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Seamlessly connect and interact with friends, share updates, and explore a dynamic social environment.

projects.name: LibraTrack
projects.description: Node.js and MongoDB-based web portal for streamlined book and author management. Effortlessly add, update, and assign authors to books.

projects.name: NodeMailer 2.0
projects.description: A powerful email service that streamlines sending messages to multiple recipients simultaneously. With support for customizable templates, it simplifies bulk email communication. Unlocking efficiency in email outreach, MailMaster 2.0 is a must-have tool for IT professionals.

projects.name: ChuckleMate
projects.description: A simple Chrome extension that enhances browsing with laughter! Someone can enjoy a random joke at every click. Sleek design, endless amusement. Lightweight and fast, seamlessly integrated into Chrome. Get ChuckleMate now on the Chrome Web Store and brighten up your day!

experiences.description: Salesforce Development: Successfully managed the migration of Salesforce data from one organization to another, utilizing Apex and Lightning Web Components (LWC) to ensure seamless and accurate data transfer. Frontend Development: Designed and developed user interfaces for a deployment system using JavaScript and LWC, enhancing user experience and functionality. Ongoing Development: Actively involved in continuous development and optimization of a major client project, enhancing workflows and supporting various Salesforce functionalities, which contributed to a significant improvement in system efficiency and user satisfaction.

Salesforce Development: Successfully completed 100+ hours of training on Salesforce development, including Apex, SOQL, LWC, Apex Testing, and Flow Building. Transformed some flows into Apex code and conducted comprehensive Apex testing, ensuring a 95% pass rate on unit tests. Actively engaged in ongoing project development and support, contributing to a projected 30% increase in workflow automation efficiency. CLM (Contract Lifecycle Management): Got trained on CLM and contributed to a high-profile project for a pharmaceutical client focused on Contract Lifecycle Management by performing Apex Testing, Flow Building, Debugging, Database Management, and Unit Testing, improving contract processing efficiency by 20%.

Dynamic Web Applications: Developed dynamic web applications using React and JavaScript to automate the generation of offer letters, streamlining the HR process and reducing manual work by 50%. Front-End Development: Built and optimized user-friendly interface components for the customer-facing web application, leading to a 30% increase in customer satisfaction and a 20% reduction in user-related issues. Back-End Integration: Collaborated with the back-end development team to ensure seamless synchronization between front-end and back-end architectures, improving data consistency and application performance.

API Development: Designed and implemented secure API endpoints for offer letter upload and retrieval using Node.js and Express.js, enhancing data security and system efficiency. Frontend Integration: Collaborated with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration and communication between backend services and user interfaces, optimizing overall application performance and user experience.

full_output.name: Akash Roy
publications: Classification of Twitter Real-Time Data and Hate Speech Detection using Natural Language Processing: Applied advanced techniques to analyze and categorize real-time tweets, demonstrating expertise in Natural Language Processing (NLP). Employed SVM, LR, NB, and LSTM models to train on live tweet data, with LSTM outperforming others in hate speech detection. Published in IEEE Transactions on Computational Social Systems in collaboration with a respected professor.
